column1: I have always advocated for stronger economic ties with Israel. One of our most recent partnerships will generate at least $20 billion in economic activity & help secure peace through energy security. I applaud all involved! https://t.co/gAN4eULu1Z

@realDonaldTrump & I have accomplished a lot together over the last 4 years. We’ve rebuilt our military secured American energy independence & confirmed over 150 conservative judges to the bench. Can we count on your continued support? https://t.co/cj5Ca2wThZ

I opposed NAFTA in 1994 because it put Oklahoma workers at a disadvantage. Thanks to @realDonaldTrump's leadership we now have a fair agreement in the form of the USMCA which will be a big win for Oklahoma truckers manufacturers and farmers. https://t.co/1alZPiP53K

@realDonaldTrump secured another major victory with the signing of a preliminary U.S. - China trade deal and I applaud the President for working toward a good deal instead of a fast one. https://t.co/8OmsMh7sJg

In the 47 years since Roe v. Wade abortion has deprived tens of millions of babies of a chance at life. I signed a letter with many of my fellow Oklahoma legislators asking the Supreme Court to overturn Roe and end the era of abortion-on-demand. https://t.co/mFAOTOv3U8

With the 2020 election in full swing the Democrats are showing their true colors by proposing radical socialist policies that will undermine America's prosperity under @realDonaldTrump. Join my fight against socialism by adding your name now! https://t.co/hyBVgqkqtE

As I look back on this past year I can't help but feel incredibly grateful for everything I've been blessed with. I want to wish all of Oklahoma a happy New Year and I pray that God continues to bless America in 2020 and beyond. https://t.co/ngAeVBU7jf

We're close to our final fundraising deadline of 2019 and need your help to end the year with a bang! I'm working with @realDonaldTrump to ensure that 2020 is our most successful yet. Help us by chipping in $20.19 (or more) now! https://t.co/Zd3hm11cQb

There are just a few days until the end of 2019 which means our final fundraising deadline of the year is also fast approaching. Help us close out the year strong by chipping in now! https://t.co/f0QHbnLbSs

On this day in 1945 Congress officially recognized the Pledge of Allegiance as our national pledge. May we always live up to it by working to remain "one nation under God indivisible with liberty and justice for all." https://t.co/t0G3bGLGYY

Not only are the Dems pushing for a govt. takeover of healthcare but they're trying to make taxpayers foot the bill for abortions in the process. I will continue standing with @realDonaldTrump to protect the precious lives of the unborn. https://t.co/h1IxVEXAzT

One of the highlights of this year was confirming a talented set of constitutional judicial nominees @realDonaldTrump appointed. Last week we approved & sent 12 more district court nominees to a lifetime appt. on the federal bench including 2 in OK. https://t.co/TSCsuGlhrQ

As we gather with loved ones tomorrow I pray we remember the true meaning of Christmas - celebrating the birth of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ. And may we also remember those servicemen and women who can't celebrate with us. #MerryChristmas! https://t.co/C6cuECOKQq

.@realDonaldTrump officially signed this year's #NDAA! This bipartisan legislation protects our national security interests provides our military men & women a pay raise and establishes a new branch of the U.S. military the U.S. Space Force! https://t.co/tB3jKWsMZf https://t.co/CToOGXuoBQ
Thank you Mr. President. I'm extremely proud of this year's National Defense Authorization Act and thankful for you signing it into law last night. https://t.co/r73eHMKsfB

How has President Trump kept his promise to Make America Great Again? Since taking office the U.S. economy has added more than 7 million new jobs. Plus thanks to Republican tax cuts Americans are experiencing higher wages. #GreatAgain https://t.co/xdDhDivsCs

Democrats in the House voted to impeach President Trump after an unfair and baseless witch hunt. I'm standing by President Trump against the Left's sham. Join me by chipping in now! https://t.co/MS183jDIF6 https://t.co/iSO8QyWaOz

During tonight's debate we're going to hear even more of the Left's extreme agenda for America. If they are successful in 2020 it will mean a reversal of @realDonaldTrump's accomplishments. Join my fight against the Left's radical agenda now! https://t.co/G70hUoHii1

Every day we delay #USMCA is a day that our farmers ranchers business owners and families miss out on new prosperity. This historic trade deal will create hundreds of thousands of jobs & provide a vital boost to our economy. Let's get it done! https://t.co/eQnqx4Ubrw

Last week the Senate confirmed President Trump's 50th circuit court judge! The president is reshaping U.S. courts for the better by appointing strong constitutional judges. I'm thankful to him and proud to support these qualified nominees. https://t.co/5JrKdEAfhf

I couldn't agree with President Trump more - @MarkwayneMullin is a steadfast conservative a patriot and a fearless fighter who believes in Oklahoma and the values we hold dear. https://t.co/fKdOGKDA7M

I'm proud my National Defense Authorization Act passed the House last week & will pass the Senate this week. Not only does it provide a much-needed pay increase for military men & women but it also ensures a greater housing standard for military families. https://t.co/6PclsMS3ei

The @TulsaChristmas parade is one of my favorite events of the year because we come together as a community to celebrate the birth of our Savior Jesus. I joined the fun on Saturday and even bumped into my friend @krhern! https://t.co/q9lE3lpeq3

Today marks the anniversary of the ratification the bill of rights. These amendments guarantee many of the freedoms we hold dear such as freedom of speech & religion & the right to keep and bear arms. As your Senator protecting those freedoms will always be my highest priority. https://t.co/iCKLtzoqub

Today is National @WreathsAcross America Day where we remember our fallen U.S. veterans honor those who serve and teach our children the value of freedom. Learn more at https://t.co/5m2iDNtxvf. #wreathsacrossamerica https://t.co/5GYuiDrvJr
Today I'd like to wish a very happy birthday to the @USNationalGuard. Thank you for being "Always Ready Always There" since 1636! #HappyBirthday #NationalGuard https://t.co/4zCw1Ldfpf

Did you hear the BIG news? This year's #NDAA will establish a new branch of the United States Armed Forces - The U.S. Space Force! A top priority of President Trump's I made sure it was included so we can keep up with Russia and China in space. https://t.co/GXs1AGYWZU

Nearly 1 MILLION Oklahomans voted for @realDonaldTrump in 2016. Now less than 1 year away from an election House Democrats are rushing to impeach him because they are worried he will win again. That is an insult to voters. https://t.co/ehmlFsvpWG

President Trump promised to grow our economy & he's delivered with another round of record breaking jobs numbers. Even the liberals who hate him can’t deny "these are the best numbers of our lives." Another reason why I'm proud to support him in 2020. https://t.co/KeFBG9gRHo https://t.co/xH8QeIn6lW

78 years ago on this day 2403 Americans lost their lives at Pearl Harbor an attack that spurred America's involvement in WWII. We will never forget this day of infamy and the heroes that we lost. https://t.co/YqRhhcAxUp

I agree with Mrs. Lohse. President Trump promised to rebuild our military grow our economy and appoint conservative judges and he has delivered. I am looking forward to working with President Trump in 2020 and beyond to #KeepAmericaGreat. https://t.co/69QSi6lg4Z

Oklahomans are benefiting from @realDonaldTrump's policies. He's rebuilt our military grown the economy & put more conservatives on the bench. I’m proud to work with him & endorse him for reelection in 2020. Together we can keep America safe & strong! https://t.co/L8JJu2A8za
On this Thanksgiving I am grateful for a supportive group of family friends and Oklahomans who showcase a loving spirit every day. From my family to yours Happy Thanksgiving! https://t.co/7Slwj10nrN

The Left is covering up their own failures from the past year with a desperate attempt to impeach President Trump. Help us fight their agenda of obstruction and constitutional destruction by signing your name now! https://t.co/R8Z1VnJodc https://t.co/4bCj9bVoLP

On #VeteransDay we are reminded of the valiant service from our men and women in uniform. From my time in the U.S. Army to my role on the Armed Services Committee I have had the honor of knowing countless incredible veterans. I am deeply grateful for their service! https://t.co/Q5vhGXXRMP

Every day Senator Inhofe is standing up for our shared conservative values and fighting the far-left extremists who want to undermine them. Are you signed up to receive updates from him and our team? Add your name now! https://t.co/Mv3apup0xG https://t.co/t8H38dZkmB
